sentences.en: "What's that thing in the middle of the fountain?"— 'Some kind of statue. I guess.'
sentences.cn: “喷泉中间的那个是什么东西？”——“估计是塑像什么的吧。”

sentences.en: Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy.
sentences.cn: 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地.

sentences.en: As I bent over , my fountain pen fell to the ground.
sentences.cn: 我一哈腰把钢笔掉在地上了.

sentences.en: He was a fountain of information on Asian affairs.
sentences.cn: 他是亚洲事务的信息源。

sentences.en: Located off-center in the irregularly shaped lake was a fountain.
sentences.cn: 在这个形状不规则的湖泊的湖心以外的地方有一眼喷泉。

sentences.en: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen.
sentences.cn: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。

sentences.en: Swashing against the rocks, the breakers sent up a fountain of spray.
sentences.cn: 海水冲击礁石, 激起高高的浪花.

sentences.en: Ten minutes later we were sluicing off dust at the fountain in the town centre.
sentences.cn: 10分钟之后，我们就在市中心的喷泉里冲洗身上的灰尘了。

sentences.en: The brain is the ultimate fountain of ideas.
sentences.cn: 大脑是思想的根本源泉.

sentences.en: The fountain flows with a merry gurgle.
The fountain is reputed never to dry up.
The fountain wells its cold water.
The main square has a fountain that spouts water 40 feet into the air.
sentences.cn: 主广场有个喷泉，能将水喷射至40英尺高的空中。

sentences.en: The volcano spewed a fountain of molten rock 650 feet in the air.
sentences.cn: 这座火山喷射出的岩浆高达650英尺。

sentences.en: These fountain pens last a long time.
You are a fountain of ideas.
You will see its fountain of water every now and then.
sentences.cn: 你会看到它不时喷出水柱.

phrases.tran_cn: n. （设于公共场所的）自动饮水器
饮水器；供应饮用水之处

trans.tran_cn: 人造喷泉，喷泉水，泉源，液体贮存器，汽水桶，冷饮柜，源头，来源
trans.tran_en: a structure from which water is pushed up into the air, used for example as decoration in a garden or park
